Verses: 1 ippodhum Manupuththirane, Nee Kogukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Mesek Thoobaal Jaadhigalin Adhipadhiyaagiya Koge, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Varugiren.
2 naan Unnaith Thiruppi Unnai Aaru Thuradugalaal Izhuththu, Unnai Vadapurangalilirundhu Ezhumbavum Isravel Malaigalil Varavumpanni,
3 un Villai Un Idadhukaiyilirundhu Thattivittu, Un Ambugalai Un Valadhukaiyilirundhu Vizhappannuven.
4 neeyum Un Ellaa Raanuvangalum Unnodirukkira Janangalum Isravel Malaigalil Vizhuveergal; Uraainjugira Sagalavidha Patchigalukkum Veliyin Mirugangalukkum Unnai Iraiyaagakkoduppen.
5 visaalamaana Veliyil Vizhuvaai; Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
6 naan Maagogidaththilum Theevugalil Nirvisaaramaaik Kudiyirukkiravargalidaththilum Akkiniyai Anuppuven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththarendru Arindhukolvaargal.

7 ivvidhamaai Naan En Janamaagiya Isravelin Naduvile En Parisuththa Naamaththaith Therivippen; En Parisuththa Naamaththai Inip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkavotten; Adhinaal Naan Isravelil Parisuththaraagiya Karththar Endru Purajaadhigal Arindhukolvaargal.
8 idho, Adhu Vandhu, Adhu Sambaviththadhu Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Naan Sonna Naal Idhuve.

9 isravel Pattanangalin Kudigal Veliye Poi, Kedagangalum, Parisaigalum, Villugalum, Ambugalum Valaithadigalum, Eettigalumaagiya Aayudhangalai Eduththu Erippaargal; Ezhuvarusham Avaigalai Eduththu Erippaargal.

10 avargal Veliyilirundhu Viragukonduvaraamalum Kaadugalil Vettaamalum, Aayudhangalai Eduththu Erippaargal; Avargal Thangalaik Kollaiyittavargalaik Kollaiyittu, Thangalai Sooraiyaadinavargalai Sooraiyaaduvaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

11 annaalil Isravel Dhesaththile Samuththiraththukkuk Kizhakke Prayaanakkaararin Pallaththaakkaip Pudhaikkira Sthaanamaaga Kogukkuk Koduppen; Adhu Vazhippokkar Mookkaip Poththikkondupogappannum; Ange Kogaiyum Avanudaiya Ellaa Senaiyaiyum Pudhaiththu, Adhai Aamonkogin Pallaththaakku Enbaargal.
12 isravel Vamsaththaar, Dhesaththai Suththampannumpadikku Avargalaip Pudhaiththuththeera Ezhumaadham Sellum.
13 dhesaththin Janangalellaarum Pudhaiththukkondiruppaargal; Naan Magimaippadum Annaalile Adhu Avargalukkuk Keerththiyaaga Irukkum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

14 dhesaththai Suththampannuvadharkaaga Adhil Kidakkum Matrap Predhangalaip Pudhaikkumpadikku Niththamum Dhesaththil Sutriththiriyum Manusharaiyum, Sutriththirigiravargalodekoodap Pudhaikkiravargalaiyum Therindhu Niyamippaargal; Ezhumaadhangal Mudindhapinbum Ivargal Thedikkondiruppaargal.

15 dhesaththil Sutriththirigiravargal Thirindhukondiruppaargal; Yaaraavadhu Oruvan Manushanin Elumbaikkaanumpodhu Pudhaikkiravargal Adhai Aamonkogudaiya Pallaththaakkile Pudhaikkumattum Adhinandaiyile Oru Adaiyaalaththai Naattuvaan.
16 andha Nagaraththukku Aamonaa Endru Peyaridappadum; Ivvidhamaai Dhesaththai Suththampannuvaargal.

17 manupuththirane, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee Sagalavidha Patchigalaiyum Veliyil Irukkira Sagala Mirugangalaiyum Nokki: Neengal Egamaaik Koodikkondu, Isravelin Malaigalil Naan Ungalukkaaga Seyyum Yaagamaagiya Magaa Yaagaththukku Sutrilumirundhu Vandhuserndhu, Maamsam Thindru Raththankudiyungal.

18 neengal Paraakkiramasaaligalin Maamsaththaith Thindru, Boomiyinudaiya Prabukkalin Raththaththaik Kudippeergal; Avargal Ellaarum Paasaanile Kozhuththuppona Aattukkadaakkalukkum Aattukkuttigalukkum Vellaattuk Kadaakkalukkum Kaalaigalukkum Samaanamaanavargal.
19 naan Ungalukkaaga Seyyum Yaagaththile Neengal Thirupthiyaagumalavum Kozhuppaith Thindru Veriyaagumalavum Raththaththaik Kudippeergal.

20 ivvidhamaai En Pandhiyile Kudhiraigalaiyum, Radhaveerargalaiyum, Paraakkiramasaaligalaiyum, Sagala Yuththaveerargalaiyum Thindru, Thirupthiyaaveergalendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollu.
21 ivvidhamaai En Magimaiyai Naan Purajaadhigalukkulle Vilangappannuven; Naan Seydha En Nyaayaththaiyum, Avargalmel Naan Vaiththa En Kaiyaiyum Ellaa Jaadhigalum Kaanbaargal.
22 andrumudhal Endrum Naan Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Isravel Vamsaththaar Arindhukolvaargal.

23 isravel Vamsaththaar Thangal Akkiramaththinimiththame Siraippattupponaargal Endru Appozhudhu Purajaadhigal Arindhukolvaargal; Avargal Enakku Virodhamaaith Dhrogampanninapadiyaal, En Mugaththai Naan Avargalukku Maraiththu, Avargal Saththurukkalin Kaiyil Avargalai Oppukkoduththen; Avargal Anaivarum Pattayaththaal Vizhundhaargal.
24 avargaludaiya Asuththaththukkuth Thakkadhaagavum, Avargaludaiya Meerudhalgalukkuththakkadhaagavum, Naan Avargalukku Seydhu, En Mugaththai Avargalukku Maraiththen.
25 aadhalaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:

26 avargal Thangal Avamaanaththaiyum, Bayappaduththuvaar Illaamal, Thaangal Sugamaaith Thangal Dhesaththil Kudiyirukkumpodhu Enakku Virodhamaaith Thaangal Seydha Ellaath Dhrogaththaiyum Sumandhu Theerththapinbu, Naan Yaakkobin Siraiyiruppaiththiruppi, Isravel Vamsamanaiththukkum Irangi, En Parisuththa Naamaththukkaaga Vairaakkiyamaayiruppen.

27 naan Avargalai Janasadhalangalilirundhu Thirumbivarappanni, Avargaludaiya Pagaignarin Dhesangalilirundhu Avargalaik Koottikkonduvandhu, Thiralaana Jaadhigaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Avargalukkul Naan Parisuththar Endru Vilangumpodhu,

28 thangalaip Purajaadhigalidaththil Siraippattuppogappannina Naan Thangalil Oruvaraiyum Ange Appuram Vaikkaamal, Thangalaith Thangal Suyadhesaththile Thirumbakkoottikkonduvandhen Enbadhinaal, Naan Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
29 naan Isravel Vamsaththaarmel En Aaviyai Ootrinapadiyinaal En Mugaththai Ini Avargalukku Maraikkamaatten Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar Endraar.
